abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Municipality of La
            Paz Secondary Education Transformation Project for Bolivia
            is to support La Paz's education strategy by: (i)
            increasing access to secondary education for adolescents and
            young people and improving their permanence in the education
            system; (ii) improving quality and relevance of primary and
            secondary education; and (iii) strengthening the
            decentralized education management capacity. The changes and
            rationale are as follows: 1) a revision of the scope and
            description of some project sub-components to respond to
            project, municipal and country realities, including the new
            education law, Avelino Sinani - Elizardo Perez , which was
            passed in December 2010; 2) a reallocation of funds among
            categories consistent with the increase in cost of
            construction, furniture and equipment and a consequent
            reduction in the cost and scope of project activities
            relating to the quality of education and institutional
            strengthening; 3) a revision of the results matrix to
            reflect the adjustments in project activities. New
            indicators have been introduced to monitor the number of
            direct project beneficiaries; and 4) a six-month extension
            of the closing date so that the remaining planned classrooms
            can be completed.
